articles.title: 988: Suicide prevention hotline is taking calls at this new number - Fox News
articles.description: Americans experiencing suicidal thoughts or other mental health crises can call 988 for help from the National Suicide Prevention Lifetline — previously a 10-digit number.
articles.content:
If you or someone you know is having thoughts of suicide, please contact the National Suicide Prevention Lifeline at 988.
